attributes.action: Waive visa requirements for all Ukrainian citizens who travel to UK fleeing war
attributes.additional_details: The UK has an ethical and moral duty to support Ukrainians fleeing war. Current visa concessions, extending only to the Ukrainian nationals already in the UK, are not enough. The UK must join other countries that have waived their visa requirements (Ireland, Poland, and Romania at the time of posting this petition).
attributes.background: Allow all Ukrainian citizens fleeing their country following the Russian invasion to enter the UK without any visa requirements.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Wave visa requirement for Ukrainian refugees: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609530

Offer fast track asylum to any Ukrainians displaced due to the invasion: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609382
